p: Demographics, frequency of GBA variants, LRRK2 p.G2019S mutations, rs6812193 and rs6825004 genotypes were compared between PD cases and controls using the Student t-test for continuous variables, and the chi-square and Fisherâ€™s exact tests for categorical variables. We used logistic regression analyses to test whether the SNPs (predictors) are associated with PD status (outcome) in models adjusted for age, gender, and GBA and LRRK2 mutation status.
